mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (id, pwd, name, gender, age, warning) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{age}, 0)
INSERT INTO Survey (id, subscription_type, ott_services) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subscriptionType}, #{ottServices})
mapper.select: SELECT subscription_type AS subscriptionType, ott_services AS ottServices FROM Survey WHERE id = #{userId}
